oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Carte de visite of Union Capt. Lewis M. Jarvis
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Capt. Jarvis was a Sneedville attorney who commanded Co. E, 8th Tenn. Cav. USA at Battle of Yellow Store near Surgoinsville (Tenn." The donor's ancestor served under Capt. Jarvis and was furloughed in January 1865 to come back to Hancock County where he was captured by Confederate partisans under a leader named Surgeoner and hung. Photograph by T. F. Saltsman, a Nashville photographer.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Jarvis, Lewis M.
